AboutUsText: ModelKos is the leading interactive fashion database connecting the world to models, creative talent, magazines, and luxury and commercial brands. With 1.1 million unique visits per month, the site stands as an essential tool to attribute credit and source new talent.
GallerySecondP: ModelKos is seeking for new talent, so join the largest modeling agency in Kosovo and show off your skills. Be a model!
ModelMarketingParagraph: With a network of over 200,000 active members, Model Kos is the top marketplace for models, photographers, and creative talents in fashion to look for work. Add your online modeling portfolio to ModelKos so that prospective clients can view and make direct bookings. Modeling profiles are completely customizable, allowing you to add your Instagram feed for potential clients to view. So far, thousands of members have been scouted by industry professionals for both castings and work. Join our community to get started!

services.title: TRAINING
services.text: We train actors for commercials, campaigns, stores, showrooms, and retail outlets.

services.title: COACHING
services.text: We get the most out of our talents through coaching, private discussions, and trainings.

services.title: SELECTION
services.text: ModelKos is by your side during the selection and casting process. We plan efficient processes for you and your customers.

services.title: SOCIAL MEDIA
services.text: Other services include social media, influencer marketing, castings, and switching at top photographers and videographers.

services.title: JOBS
services.text: We provide you either direct employment through our international employment service partners.

services.title: MANAGEMENT
services.text: We will help your business grow by enabling world class model management and consulting.

services.title: BRAND AMBASSADOR
services.text: With us, you will be a brand partner and earn provision on sales generated by your business for our partners.

services.title: COLLABORATION
services.text: Working with us means to have a big family, you can work with other models to get even more reach.

BecomeModelParagraph: ModelKos is one of the most influential fashion news sites and creative resources within the fashion industry, with an extensive database, feature interviews of the creative stars of the industry, and its influential top model rankings
WhatPeopleSaySlideParagraph: Sarah Doukas founded the agency in her home in 1987. With Richard Branson as her business partner, Sarah revolutionized the traditional modeling industry by launching the first UK agency to represent, worldwide, new faces Sarah had discovered herself and this became the hallmark of the agency.
PartnershipsParagraph: MediaKos assists all influencers, models, and artists in managing their social media accounts, as well as creating content and much more.
KosovaGirlsParagraph: MediaKos, in collaboration  with KosovaGirls, provides women with support and free training in fashion, design, hair styling, photography, video shooting, modeling, acting and other areas.

blogPosts.title: Things You Should Know About The Modeling Industry in 2022
blogPosts.content: Every year, the modeling industry changes, and so do the things that aspiring models should know to be successful. Therefore, it's essential to educate yourself about the industry to keep up with the times and be prepared for what is coming ahead.

blogPosts.title: 8 Simple Tips to Help You Prepare For Your Next Photoshoot
blogPosts.content: A photoshoot is an exciting opportunity for models to show their creativity and personality. However, it can also be a challenging experience if you don't prepare properly.

blogPosts.title: Five Ways to Use Social Media To Start Your Modeling Career
blogPosts.content: It's not a secret that social media is one of the most powerful tools in marketing these days. It has been proven time and again that people who use it are more likely to buy your products or services. Now, it's also being used as a career platform.

blogPosts.title: Top Ten Modeling Tips for Aspiring Models
blogPosts.content: Whether you're just starting out as a model or you're an experienced pro, you should always feel comfortable modeling.  Before any shoot, you should either have a phone call or a sit-down meeting.

blogPosts.content: While there are sample modeling agencies to pick from - it can be hard to know who to sign up with but more importantly, if they will have exactly what you need to suceed as a model of influencer.

blogPosts.title: Modeling Expert ModelKos
blogPosts.content: ModelKos Founder, Vanessa Helmer is the Modeling Expert for TheBalance.com. Vanessa shares her 35 years experience as an international model agent and scout with aspiring models looking for expert modeling advice and guidance.

JoinAcademyParagraph: If you want to be a model then we are here to offer advice and create a platform for new aspiring models. We endeavor to work across a diverse range of talent and champion every individual regardless of their background or ability. We are a female-led team of accomplished, diverse women.

benefits.text: Affiliate partnerships for direct deals and ambassador programs with big fashion brands
Work in intersting sectors, such as TV & Entertainment, Music, Movie Industry, Online Influencer, Gaming or Fashion

Dedicated social and business management for a successful social media presence: We manage Youtube channel, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter accounts for any of our models in partnership with MediaKos

historyParagraph1: ModelKos was created with the commitment and understanding that all talent can be equally represented and that appropriate rates and fees for services be negotiated and paid to talent in a timely fashion. With its own house studio and technical staff, ModelKos also understands the timely needs of the Model, Talent, Client, Producer, Director, and all support staff in print, television, and movie production.
historyParagraph2: ModelKos's Social Media department is constantly working to add content, tags, mentions and other engagement for our models, talent, clients and all our partners.
